name: ComplexNumbers

unions.name: ComplexNumberCartesian
unions.comment: Cartesian representation of a complex number

unions.name: ComplexNumberPolar
unions.comment: Polar representation of a complex number

unions.name: Theta
unions.comment: Angle in real-complex plane of modulus

values.name: add
values.comment: Add two complex numbers together
values.type: ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian number -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian number -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian number

values.name: applyCartesian
values.comment: Apply for Complex Number Cartesian representaiton applicative
values.type: ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian (a -> b) -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian a -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian b

values.name: applyPolar
values.comment: Apply for Complex Number polar representaiton applicative
values.type: ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberPolar (a -> b) -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberPolar a -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberPolar b

values.name: bindCartesian
values.comment: Monadic bind for Complex Number Cartesian representaiton
values.type: ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian a -> (a -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian b) -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian b

values.name: bindPolar
values.comment: Monadic bind for Complex Number polar representaiton
values.type: ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberPolar a -> (a -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberPolar b) -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberPolar b

values.name: conjugate
values.comment: Calculate the conjugate of a complex number

values.name: convertFromCartesianToPolar
values.comment: Convert from the Cartesian representation of a complex number to the polar representation

values.name: convertFromPolarToCartesian
values.comment: Convert from the polar representation of a complex number to the Cartesian representation

values.name: divide
values.comment: Divide two complex numbers together
values.type: ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian Basics.Float -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian Basics.Float -> Result.Result String.String (ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian Basics.Float)

values.name: dividePolar
values.comment: Divide two complex numbers in polar representations together
values.type: ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberPolar Basics.Float -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberPolar Basics.Float -> Result.Result String.String (ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberPolar Basics.Float)

values.name: i
values.comment: The number i

values.name: imaginaryPart
values.comment: Extracts the imaginary part of a complex number

values.name: mapCartesian
values.comment: Map over a complex number

values.name: mapPolar
values.comment: Map over a complex number in polar representation

values.name: modulus
values.comment: Calculate the modulus of a complex number

values.name: modulusPart
values.comment: Extracts the modulus part of a complex number

values.name: multiply
values.comment: Multiply two complex numbers together
values.type: ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian number -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian number -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian number

values.name: multiplyPolar
values.comment: Multiply two complex numbers in polar representations together
values.type: ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberPolar number -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberPolar number -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberPolar number

values.name: power
values.comment: Calculate a complex number raised to a power

values.name: product
values.comment: Monoidally multiply two complex numbers together

values.name: pureCartesian
values.comment: Place a value in the minimal Complex Number Cartesian context

values.name: purePolar
values.comment: Place a value in the minimal Complex Number polar context

values.name: realPart
values.comment: Extracts the real part of a complex number

values.name: subtract
values.comment: Subtract two complex numbers together
values.type: ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian number -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian number -> ComplexNumbers.ComplexNumberCartesian number

values.name: sum
values.comment: Monoidally add two complex numbers together

values.name: thetaPart
values.comment: Extracts the imaginary part of a complex number
